paper_abstract: In this paper, the mathematical properties of the proportional Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy controller are first investigated. Based on these properties, the L-2-stability of the fuzzy control systems, in which the proportional T-S fuzzy controller is utilized, is analyzed by using the well-known circle criterion. A sufficient condition with elegant graphical explanation in the frequency domain is next derived to guarantee the L-2-stability of the fuzzy control systems. Finally, the proposed sufficient condition is examined with two numerical simulations.
paper_title: L-2-STABILITY ANALYSIS OF PROPORTIONAL TAKAGI-SUGENO FUZZY CONTROLLER BASED CONTROL SYSTEMS
